verses.text:
When the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy God hath cut off the nations , whose land the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy God giveth thee, and thou succeedest them, and dwellest in their cities , and in their houses ;  +  r 19.1  t succeedest: Heb. inheritest, or, possessest *
Thou shalt separate three cities for thee in the midst of thy land , which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy God giveth thee to possess it.

Thou shalt prepare thee a way , and divide the coasts of thy land , which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy God giveth thee to inherit , into three parts , that every slayer may flee thither. \p

¶ And this \add is\add* the case of the slayer , which shall flee thither, that he may live : Whoso killeth his neighbour ignorantly , whom he hated not in time past ;\f + \fr 19.4 \ft in…: Heb. from yesterday the third day\f*

As when a man goeth into the wood with his neighbour to hew wood , and his hand fetcheth a stroke with the axe to cut down the tree , and the head slippeth from the helve , and lighteth upon his neighbour , that he die ; he shall flee unto one of those cities , and live :\f + \fr 19.5 \ft head: Heb. iron\f*\f + \fr 19.5 \ft helve: Heb. wood\f*\f + \fr 19.5 \ft lighteth…: Heb. findeth\f*

Lest the avenger of the blood pursue the slayer , while his heart is hot , and overtake him, because the way is long , and slay him ; whereas he \add was\add* not worthy of death , inasmuch as he hated him not in time past.\f + \fr 19.6 \ft slay…: Heb. smite him in life\f*\f + \fr 19.6 \ft in…: Heb. from yesterday the third day\f*
Wherefore I command thee, saying , Thou shalt separate three cities for thee.
And if the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy God enlarge thy coast , as he hath sworn unto thy fathers , and give thee all the land which he promised to give unto thy fathers ;

If thou shalt keep all these commandments to do them, which I command thee this day , to love the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy God , and to walk ever in his ways ; then shalt thou add three cities more for thee, beside these three :
That innocent blood be not shed in thy land , which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy God giveth thee \add for\add* an inheritance , and \add so\add* blood be upon thee. \p

¶ But if any man hate his neighbour , and lie in wait for him, and rise up against him, and smite him mortally that he die , and fleeth into one of these cities :\f + \fr 19.11 \ft mortally: Heb. in life\f*
Then the elders of his city shall send and fetch him thence, and deliver him into the hand of the avenger of blood , that he may die.
Thine eye shall not pity him, but thou shalt put away \add the guilt of\add* innocent blood from Israel , that it may go well with thee. \p

¶ Thou shalt not remove thy neighbour’s landmark , which they of old time have set in thine inheritance , which thou shalt inherit in the land that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy God giveth thee to possess it. \p

¶ One witness shall not rise up against a man for any iniquity , or for any sin , in any sin that he sinneth : at the mouth of two witnesses , or at the mouth of three witnesses , shall the matter be established. \p
¶ If a false witness rise up against any man to testify against him \add that which is\add* wrong ;\f + \fr 19.16 \ft that…: or, falling away\f*
Then both the men , between whom the controversy \add is\add*, shall stand before the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, before the priests and the judges , which shall be in those days ;
And the judges shall make diligent inquisition : and, behold, \add if\add* the witness \add be\add* a false witness , \add and\add* hath testified falsely against his brother ;
Then shall ye do unto him, as he had thought to have done unto his brother : so shalt thou put the evil away from among you.
And those which remain shall hear , and fear , and shall henceforth commit no more any such evil among you.
And thine eye shall not pity ; \add but\add* life \add shall go\add* for life , eye for eye , tooth for tooth , hand for hand , foot for foot.
